EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners Conversation appointment reschedule (1323887582.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hi Richard, Thank you for letting me know. I noticed that you scheduled a time for tomorrow as well, would that time work for you or do you want to push that back as well? Please let me know when you are available and I will be happy to reach out to you. Thank you and have a great day! Nicolette ___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed.Â If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. -----Original Message----- From: Richard Beynon [mailto:rich@richbeynon.com] Sent: Wednesday, December 14, 2011 12:46 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: MBO Partners Conversation appointment reschedule Sorry, I need to push this out a few days - I had an appointment come up unexpectedly. Thanks.
